== Poyya (CT) (627883) ==

Poyya (CT) is a town in the [[Kodungallur]] taluka of [[Thrissur]] district with an area of 9.44 sq. km. and harbouring 2696 households with total population of 10478 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Thrissur]] is at a distance of 40 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 276 km. Male population is 5003 and female population is 5475. Scheduled Caste population is 1266 and Scheduled Tribes population is 21. Census Location Code of the town is 627883<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class IV (population_total 10,000 to 19,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Thrissur (m corp.) at a distance of 40 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Kochi (m corp. + og)  at a distance of 40 km. Railway station is at Chalakudy at a distance of 20 km.
